TEXT.TITLE: FEDERATED DEPARTMENT STORES <FDS> MARCH SALES UP
TEXT.BODY: Federated Department Stores Inc said sales for the five weeks ended April Four were up 4.9 pct to 934.9 mln dlrs from 891.6 mln dlrs a year before., The company said sales for the first two months of its fiscal year were up 6.8 pct to 1.65 billion dlrs from 1.55 billion dlrs a year before. Reuter
